channel.title: Basemap on Eduard Roccatello's GIS blog
channel.description: Recent content in Basemap on Eduard Roccatello's GIS blog

item.title: Let's create a beautiful raster basemap in QGIS 3
item.description: Hillshade styling, color banding, labeling and contour extraction

item.title: How to create a respect area in QGIS 3 to manage an hazardous event
item.description: Let’s create a respect area starting from an event point and using buffer and difference vector processing tools.

item.title: How to add a XYZ basemap layer to QGIS 3. Also a Python script to add the most common one easily!
item.description: I will also teach you how to use a python script to add a bunch of existing basemaps.
